item.title: Hera add a quote by Patricia T. O'Conner
item.description: "If the good news from cyberspace is that we're writing more, the bad news is that most of us aren't very good at it. Our words don't do justice to our ideas." -- Patricia T. O'Conner

item.title: Hera add a quote by Irvin D. Yalom
item.description: "It is wrong to bear children out of need, wrong to use a child to alleviate loneliness, wrong to provide purpose in life by reproducing another copy of oneself. It is wrong also to seek immortality by spewing one's germ into the future as though sperm contains your consciousness!" -- Irvin D. Yalom
